pageTitle: Court date set for Padgett | GalaxGazette.com
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {21090=Terri Lynn Padgett of Hillsville faces 14 felony charges and 12 misdemeanor charges of embezzlement in Grayson County and will appear in court April 3. She was indicted on charges in April 2007., 26382=The Gazette | circulation@galaxgazette.com | 276-236-5178 ex 204 P.O.
